summary: Overhauls the wood chopping in Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
Adds endless wood chopping without stopping after six pieces. A new Wood Chopping Sanctuary has also been constructed near Riverwood, and more chopping blocks have been added to every major city. Watch my video in the mirror section. Also available on the Steam Workshop.

The Sanctuary
   -Anvil
   -Plenty of empty chests
   -Four chopping blocks
   -Two firewood buyers

Endless Wood Chopping
   -Won\'t stop after six pieces
   -Available at every chopping block
   -If you think you can get too much money from it, don\'t sell the firewood: moderation

Added Chopping Blocks
   -More chopping blocks in every major city
   -A chopping block in every house has been added
   -A total of probably over 20 have been added

Bugs
   -I haven\'t found any, but if you find a chopping block that doesn\'t work, post a comment telling me where it is.
author: grant343
